sentences.en: He'd doubtless heard rumours on the grapevine.
sentences.cn: 他无疑是听到了小道消息。

sentences.en: I had heard through the grapevine that he was quite critical of what we were doing.
sentences.cn: 我听到有传言说他对我们在做的工作非常不满。

sentences.en: I heard ( about ) it through [ on ] the ( neighborhood ) grapevine.
sentences.cn: 我是经 ( 附近的 ) 谣传 听到这事情的.

sentences.en: I heard about your success on the office grapevine.
sentences.cn: 我听到了办公室的传闻,说你取得了成功.

sentences.en: I heard about your success through the office grapevine.
sentences.cn: 我透过办公室的内线管道听说了你的成功.

sentences.en: I learned through the grapevine that you have a new job.
sentences.cn: 我从别处听说你有了新工作.

sentences.en: I've just got it through the grapevine.
sentences.cn: 我只是道听途说,只是小道消息.

sentences.en: Instead, check out the company's reputation through the industry grapevine.
sentences.cn: 还是通过本行业内线来了解公司的声誉为好.

sentences.en: She heard it through the grapevine.
Some of the most exciting information comes by way of the grapevine.
sentences.cn: 一些令人振奋的信息来自小道消息.

sentences.en: The grapevine that produces the best wines thrived in barren fields.
sentences.cn: 酿顶级葡萄酒的葡萄藤,都是从最贫瘠的土壤中生长出来.

sentences.en: They were told to desist from spreading grapevine news.
sentences.cn: 已告诉他们停止散布小道消息.

sentences.en: Well, I hear it through the grapevine.
sentences.cn: 嗯, 我从内幕消息听到的.

sentences.en: Well, I heard it through the grapevine.
sentences.cn: 嗯, 我这是内幕消息.

sentences.en: You must have heard it through the grapevine.

words.tran_cn: 葡萄树；葡萄藤；小道消息；秘密情报网

trans.tran_cn: 葡萄藤，谣传，流言，小道消息，消息的秘密来源
trans.tran_en: a climbing plant on which grapes grow
